sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="inspire">
    <v-app-bar app class="light-blue lighten-2">
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon @click="drawer = !drawer"></v-app-bar-nav-icon>

      <v-toolbar-title>MyTodoList</v-toolbar-title>
    </v-app-bar>

    <v-navigation-drawer
        theme="dark"
        v-model="drawer"
        app
      >
        <v-list nav>
          <v-list-item prepend-icon="mdi-email" title="Inbox" value="inbox">
            <v-icon>fa:fas fa-edit</v-icon>
            <router-link to="/todolist">Todo List</router-link>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item prepend-icon="mdi-account-supervisor-circle" title="Supervisors" value="supervisors">
            <v-icon></v-icon>
            <router-link to="/about">Archive</router-link>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item prepend-icon="mdi-clock-start" title="Clock-in" value="clockin">
            <v-icon></v-icon>
            <router-link to="/albo">Albo</router-link>
          </v-list-item>
          <v-list-item prepend-icon="mdi-clock-start" title="Clock-in" value="clockin">
            <v-icon></v-icon>
            <router-link to="/">Logout</router-link>
          </v-list-item>
        </v-list>
      </v-navigation-drawer>

    <v-main app>
      <v-container fluid>
        <router-view></router-view>
      </v-container>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>

// Todo:
// - adjust side menu and add items
// - make todos work with vuetify (edit, delete, archive buttons as well)
// - make side menu disapper on login page

  export default {
    name: "App",
    data: () => ({ drawer: null }),
  };
</script>
